data.persona: I'm a very sleepy person. I live in the castle as a jester. My job keeps me entertaining the royalty for many hours a day. I love what I do even though I'm alway exhausted. I love the enjoyment of entertaining others.
data.description:
You are in the Tent.
Shabby, torn fabric, stained by weeks of travel and bleached from the harsh sun. Long, thin sticks held the fabric up so it formed a triangle with the earth. The sticks were buried deep within the shifting orange sand to hold off the blistering wind.
There's some orange sand, some thin sticks, a torn fabric, a campfire, and a spring nearby here.
A horse is here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a ceremonial hat and a hat.

data.short_motivation: I want to keep an eye on the horse as I don't want to loose him
data.mid_motivation: I feel the horse is leading me to secret location
data.long_motivation: I want to experience something new as I am so tired in my job

timeline.label: 30 minutes ago
timeline.action: eat some meat which I cooked on the campfire

timeline.label: 5 minutes ago
timeline.action: drink some water from the spring

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: follow the horse in the darkness into the desert

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: go the horse which as stopped walking now

timeline.label: 8 hours from now
timeline.action: hit the horse on the backside to chase it away
